<<<<<<< HEAD
By the King a proclamation touching the planters in the island of Saint Christophers. England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
3 leaves.
Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ..., [London] In the Savoy : 1671.
Printed as broadside, divided into three leaves. "Given at Our Court at Whitehall the Two and twentieth day of December 1671. in the Twenty third year of Our reign, 1671." Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
By the King a proclamation touching the planters in the island of Saint Christophers. England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
3 leaves.
Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ..., [London] In the Savoy : 1671.
Printed as broadside, divided into three leaves. "Given at Our Court at Whitehall the Two and twentieth day of December 1671. in the Twenty third year of Our reign, 1671." Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
Christopher Barker
John Bill
